title: Valken equivqlent in Google Fonts
content:
Hi, I'm building a Web App, and i used Valken in Photoshop CS6 for the font on my homepage, I would like to use a CSS equivalent of this font............

I am searching on Google fonts and cannot find something exactly like it, as you guys are experts in this can you help.........

Also does there exist a chart on the web where you can find the font in Photoshop which correlates to Google Fonts, it would save a lot of time........

Thanks

Ant
author: antpowerWD

comments.content: If the goal is to eventually use a Google Web font, why didn't you start with that in the first place?
There are many similar fonts. For instance, [VAG Rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621031548/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/vag-rounded/) is available as a web font.
